    • Method Detail

      • getMiniRoomsBaseValue

        public double getMiniRoomsBaseValue()
        Returns the base value
        Returns:
        base value of the mini rooms

      • setMiniRoomsBaseValue

        public void setMiniRoomsBaseValue​(double miniRoomsBaseValue)
        Sets the base value of the mini rooms
        Parameters:
        miniRoomsBaseValue - the base value to set

      • initializeMiniRooms

        public void initializeMiniRooms​(double miniRoomsBaseValue)
        Goes over the mini room matrix to initialize the minirooms, assigning the window boolean and the rent value according to the location

        Precondition: The user starts the program

        Postcondition: Mini rooms with initial values

        Parameters:
        miniRoomsBaseValue - base value of the mini rooms for the calculations

      • rentMiniRoom

        public java.lang.String rentMiniRoom​(java.lang.String miniRoomLocation,
                                     java.time.LocalDate rentDate,
                                     java.lang.String companyNit,
                                     java.lang.String name,
                                     int numberOfServers)
        Rents a mini room considering its location, information of the company and date of rent

        Precondition: The user selected the option to rent a mini room in the menu

        Postcondition: A message indicating the rent of the mini room or not

        Parameters:
        miniRoomLocation - location of the mini room given in the format "ROW, COLUMN"
        rentDate - the date of rent of the mini room
        companyNit - nit of the associated company that is renting the mini room
        name - name of the associated company that is renting the mini room
        numberOfServers - number of servers that will be used in the mini room
        Returns:
        message indicating the result of the operation

      • rentMiniRoom

        public java.lang.String rentMiniRoom​(java.lang.String miniRoomLocation,
                                     java.time.LocalDate rentDate,
                                     java.lang.String projectNumber,
                                     int numberOfServers)
        Overloaded method to rent a mini room for investigation purposes, considering its location, rent date and the number of the investigation project

        Precondition: The user selected the option to rent a mini room menu by the means of an investigation project

        Postcondition: A message indicating the rent of the mini room or not

        Parameters:
        miniRoomLocation - location of the mini room given in the format "ROW, COLUMN"
        rentDate - the date of rent of the mini room
        projectNumber - registry number of the investigation project
        numberOfServers - number of servers that will be used in the mini room
        Returns:
        message indicating the result of the operation

      • addServerToMiniRoom

        public void addServerToMiniRoom​(java.lang.String miniRoomLocation,
                                double cacheMemory,
                                double ramMemory,
                                int processorsNumber,
                                int disksNumber,
                                double totalDiskCapacity,
                                int processorBrandSelection)
        Adds a new server into the mini room considering all of its information

        Precondition: The user selected the option to rent a mini room in the menu

        Postcondition: The addition of servers in the mini room

        Parameters:
        miniRoomLocation - location of the mini room given in the format "ROW, COLUMN"
        cacheMemory - the cache memory of the server
        ramMemory - the RAM memory of the server
        processorsNumber - the number of processors of the server
        disksNumber - the number of disks of the server
        totalDiskCapacity - the total capacity of the disks (in TeraBytes)
        processorBrandSelection - the selection of the processor brand (1 for Intel, 2 for AMD)

      • printAvailableMiniRooms

        public java.lang.String printAvailableMiniRooms()
        Prints the list of available mini rooms in the matrix

        Precondition: The user selected the option to list the available mini rooms in the menu

        Postcondition: A list of the available mini rooms

        Returns:
        the list of available mini rooms

      • cancelRent

        public java.lang.String cancelRent​(java.lang.String miniRoomLocation)
        Cancels the rent of a specific mini room (Sets the status to available, erases the rent date, associated company and servers, resets the rent value to its initial value and turns the mini room off)

        Precondition: The user selected the option to cancel the rent of an specific mini room in the menu

        Postcondition: The cancelation of the rent of the mini room

        Parameters:
        miniRoomLocation - location of the mini room given in the format "ROW, COLUMN"
        Returns:
        message indicating the result of the operation

      • cancelRent

        public void cancelRent()
        Overloaded method to cancel the rent of every mini room (Sets the status to available, erases the rent date, associated company and servers, resets the rent value to its initial value and turns the mini rooms off)

        Precondition: The user selected the option to cancel the rent of all the mini rooms in the menu

        Postcondition: The cancelation of the rent of all the mini rooms

      • printDataCenterMap

        public java.lang.String printDataCenterMap()
        Goes over the mini rooms printing 1 if the mini room is on and 0 if the mini room is off

        Precondition: The user selected the option to print the data center map in the menu

        Postcondition: A map of the mini room matrix

        Returns:
        the data center map indicating the power state (on/off) of the mini rooms

      • printTestMap

        public java.lang.String printTestMap()
        Goes over the mini rooms printing 1 if the mini room is on and 0 if the mini room is off. Test variant to test the power states

        Precondition: The user was testing the power protocols

        Postcondition: A map of the mini room test matrix

        Returns:
        the test data center map indicating the power state (on/off) of the mini rooms

      • simulatePowerOnProtocol

        public void simulatePowerOnProtocol()
        Powers on every mini room in the test matrix to test the power off protocols

        Precondition: The user decided to manipulate the mini rooms in the menu, and selected the option to simulate the power on protocol

        Postcondition: All of the mini rooms are powered on disregarding the state

      • simulatePowerOffProtocol

        public void simulatePowerOffProtocol​(char letter)
        Powers off the mini rooms according to a specified way

        Precondition: The user decided to manipulate the mini rooms in the menu, and selected the option to simulate the power off protocol

        Postcondition: The mini rooms are powered off in a specified way

        Parameters:
        letter - indicates the specified way in which the mini rooms will be turned off

      • simulatePowerOffProtocol

        public void simulatePowerOffProtocol​(char letter,
                                     int columnOrRow)
        Powers off the mini rooms in columns or rows according to a number

        Precondition: The user decided to manipulate the mini rooms in the menu, and selected the option to simulate the power off protocol

        Postcondition: The mini rooms are powered off in a specified way

        Parameters:
        letter - indicates the specified way in which the mini rooms will be turned off
        columnOrRow - indicates the number of the column or row that will be turned off

      • locateMiniRoom

        public MiniRoom locateMiniRoom​(java.lang.String miniRoomLocation)
        Locates a mini room according to the location given separated by a comma

        Precondition: It is needed to interact with a mini room

        Postcondition: The mini room object is located

        Parameters:
        miniRoomLocation - location of the mini room given in the format "ROW, COLUMN"
        Returns:
        the found mini room object or null if the mini room was not found
